description: This is the main application class for a Spring Boot-based backend service. It serves as the entry point for the application, containing the main() method that launches the Spring application context.

classes.name: productapibackendApplication
classes.description: Main application class annotated with @SpringBootApplication, responsible for bootstrapping the Spring Boot application.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The entry point of the application that initializes and runs the Spring Boot app.
